review:
This is a musical romantic drama film, music is terrific & heart touching. The songs will haunt you for many days after watching .
Performance-wise Arjun Rampal has given his best & excelled in emotional scenes. Story, screenplay & direction is just average. But this is probably the best performance by Arjun Rampal as pure heart, simple, generous, unselfish guy ready to sacrifice his love.
